QuestData.Title: Wendigo Away
QuestData.Description:
If the unearthly howls coming from the Highlands at night are any indication, the wendigos must have some sort of leader or alpha.
I tell you, it's the sort of sound that could only come from some sort of massive, hulking, flesh-eating abomination.
Definitely something that could tear us limb from limb, and munch on our frail bones, all without breaking a sweat. How exhilarating!
I'm sure it'll be no problem for us to handle though.
QuestData.RewardText: Marvelous! Slaying their leader ought to put some fear into 'em.
